name: RUNNING OUT OF SPACE IN THE DEEP (IN)FINITE OCEAN. FISH.FISH.FISH.
name_original: RUNNING OUT OF SPACE IN THE DEEP (IN)FINITE OCEAN. FISH.FISH.FISH.
description:
You're a fish, you've got enough running in circle in your jar. You decide to explore in search of empty space(x,y).

Eat try to survive despise plastic particles and multiple dangers around.
Arrows to move, Z to dash.

*** POST LD version has also mouse control, and that's good.

Hope you'll have fun ! <3

PS: I'm really happy with the improvements of post jam version but please if you have to rate on LD jam also the original one (I mean try both plz :)

<3<3<3

What's going on?

FISHES likes FOOD

Such as DEAD FISHES

They follow LEADERS seeking FOOD, and going opposite of DANGER.

AGGRESSIVE FISHES attacks when BIGGER and CLOSE

TRASH BAGS and smells like FOOD and generates more TRASH

TOO MUCH trash in the OCEAN, EVERYBODY DIES

TOXIC FISHES eating in TRASH BAGS become LEADER

SHARKS are AGGRESSIVE

CRABS are FUNNY

SWIM IN PEACE

DASH TO SURVIVE

UNLEACH THE FURY DESTROY THE TRASH
<3
